Name: Closed source
Description: You can play your cards hidden.

Name: Unsafe
Description: Discard your other visible techniques.

Name: Orphan rule
Description: Next player cannot play a card sharing more than 3 words with any of your visible cards.

Name: Orphan rule bypass
Description: Cards from last round are added to the bottom of next player's draw pile, all piles are shuffled

Name: Rc<RefCell>
Description: Draw a card from next player's hand, they can get it back if they play it now.

Name: Unwrap()
Description: Every player must activate all their hidden cards.

Name: Borrow checker
Description: If a card moved on previous turn (not played or drawn), retrieve it to your hand.

Name: Arc<Mutex<T>>
Description: Give 3 cards to next player from your hand or draw pile, next turn, they give back those they didnÂ´t play.

Name: Lifetime annotations
Description: Lose 1 point for each of your visible cards

Name: std::mem::forget
Description: all other players hide a card.

Name: Linked List
Description: Each player gives a card to another player, who didn't receive a card from this ability.

Name: #[allow(warnings)]
Description: Force activate all your hidden cards (this can't fail).

Name: Infinite recursion
Description: Draw 5 cards, discard your deck.

Name: Stack overflow
Description: Put 2 cards from next players draw pile on the top of your draw pile.

Name: PhantomData<T>
Description: Draw a card and play it, but set its points to 0, play again.

Name: Deadlock
Description: Next player must play the same category than their last turn's first card, or draw a card.

Name: Turbofish
Description: Hide another technique.

Name: Toilet closure
Description: Every player discard a rightest visible card.

Name: Compiling
Description: Skip your next turn.

Name: Fuzzing
Description: Swap 2 hidden cards.

Name: FizzBuzz
Description:
Passive: this card's points depend on the amount of visible cards:
+3pts if it's dividable by 3
+3pts if it's dividable by 4

Name: Cursed code
Description:
Play hidden, when activated, this can't fail and goes to next player, hidden.

This always count towards final points.
